home.title: PulseFeedX - Vibe Code Your AI SaaS to Production
home.description: PulseFeedX is a platform that provides a wide range of AI tools and services to help you stay on top of your business. Generate images, text and everything else that you need to get your business off the ground.

pricing.title: Pricing - PulseFeedX SaaS Starter
pricing.description: Choose the perfect plan for your AI SaaS. This pricing section is built with Sistine Starter - fully integrated with Creem for recurring payments.

blog.title: Blog - PulseFeedX
blog.description: Latest insights and updates from our team. Learn about AI SaaS development, vibe coding, and best practices for building production-ready applications.

contact.title: Contact Us - PulseFeedX
contact.description: Get in touch with the PulseFeedX team. We'd love to hear from you and respond as quickly as possible.

login.title: Login - PulseFeedX
login.description: Sign in to your PulseFeedX account to access powerful AI tools and services for your business.

signup.title: Sign Up - PulseFeedX
signup.description: Create your PulseFeedX account and start building your AI SaaS product today with our powerful tools.

terms.title: Terms of Service - PulseFeedX
terms.description: Read our terms of service to understand the rules and guidelines for using PulseFeedX platform.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - PulseFeedX
privacy.description: Learn how PulseFeedX collects, uses, and protects your personal information and data.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy - PulseFeedX
cookies.description: Understand how PulseFeedX uses cookies and similar tracking technologies on our platform.

refund.title: Refund Policy - PulseFeedX
refund.description: Review our refund policy to understand the conditions and process for requesting refunds.
